content.description: Currently (May of 2013) this is the only bolted line on the face to the right of the chimney/cave area.  The crux is down low pulling through the 2nd bolt on thin and sharp crimps.  The route is supposedly listed as an 11a, but that is really on the soft side.
content.location: Right side of the chimney/cave feature at the Grotto.

content.description: This climb starts deep inside the chimney.  It is always cool in here!  The rock is a bit more polished than other areas of the park.  It gets a little tight as you go up!  Shares anchors with "Chimney" route.
content.location: The bolts are on the left side of the chimney.  Furthest route inside chimney.

content.description: This line is one of my favorite moderates at Q'emiln Park.  Plus this climb is always in the shade and a great place to go on a hot afternoon.  The rock is a bit more smooth and polished than other areas in the park but the climbing is super fun.
content.location: This route starts on the left wall of the chimney.  It is the bolted route further towards the outside edge.
